titleInfo.title: Coast from Jezeerat Gunnum to Ras Sheik Munsoud. ‘Continuation’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions: 70 x 350 mm or smaller

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Watercolour, pen and ink and pencil on paper.The sketch drawn by Lieutenant Michael Houghton shows three sequential topographical views of the coastal region at the Ras Moosendem [Ra’s Musandam, Oman].The views were sketched from on board ship and show 'Casaab' [Khaşab, Oman] settlement and ‘Ras Sheik Munsoud’ [Ras Shaikh Mas’ud, Oman] with latitude reported. The central and the bottom view also feature several dhows.
